# MTLWinding.clockwise

**Case**

Primitives whose vertices are specified in clockwise order are front-facing.

## Declaration

```swift
case clockwise
```

## Winding options

- **MTLWinding.counterClockwise**: Primitives whose vertices are specified in counter-clockwise order are front-facing.

items.description: Primitives whose vertices are specified in counter-clockwise order are front-facing.
items.name: MTLWinding.counterClockwise
